statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT email, username, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND active = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'adam%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_permissions > 2 ORDER BY num_permissions DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(permission_id) AS max_permission_id FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING MAX(permission_id) > 5 ORDER BY max_permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id WHERE permission_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, ae.experience_name, ae.description FROM users u JOIN ar_experiences ae ON u.user_id = ae.user_id WHERE u.username = 'example_user';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM users ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.user_id > 100;

SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%smith%' AND p.permission_id = 3;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_id IS NULL;
